Global Communication: With the ability to understand every language spoken and written, humans could communicate with each other without any barriers. This would lead to a more connected and understanding world.
Cultural Exchange: People could better appreciate and understand different cultures, leading to a more tolerant and accepting society.
Diplomacy: Negotiations and diplomacy would become much easier, as people could communicate directly with each other without the need for interpreters.
Business: Companies could expand their operations globally, as they would be able to communicate with customers and partners from different countries.
Education: Learning a second language would no longer be necessary, as people could understand any language they encounter. This would lead to a more multilingual and diverse society.
